revision.comment: added max stat table, cost to max.

revision.text:
==Unlocking Hatchery Helpers==
{| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Name !! Cost Per Hatch !! Step Efficiency !! Attack Efficiency !! Unlock Requirements || Purchase Location |- | Sam [[File:HHSam.png|20px]] || 1,000 {{pdollar}} || 10% || 10% || 100 Eggs Hatched || rowspan=2|N/A |- | Blake [[File:HHBlake.png|20px]] || 10,000 {{pdollar}} || 10% || 20% || 500 Eggs Hatched |- | Jasmine [[File:HHJasmine.png|20px]] || 50,000 {{pdollar}} || 15% || 50% || 10,000,000 Poké Dollars {{pdollar}} || Purchase in [[Shops#Hoenn: Locations & Items|Mauville City]] |- | Parker [[File:HHParker.png|20px]] || 1,000 {{dungeontokens}} || 15% || 25% || 1,000 Eggs Hatched || N/A |- | Dakota [[File:HHDakota.png|20px]] || 10,000 {{dungeontokens}} || 50% || 50% || 100,000 Dungeon Tokens {{dungeontokens}} || Purchase in [[Shops#Johto: Locations & Items|Mahogany Town]] |- | Justice [[File:HHJustice.png|20px]] || 10 {{questpoints}} || 100% || 50% || 200 Quests Completed || N/A |- | Carey [[File:HHCarey.png|20px]] || 20 {{questpoints}} || 50% || 125% || 10,000 Quest Points {{questpoints}} || Purchase in [[Shops#Johto: Locations & Items|Olivine City]] |- | Aiden [[File:HHAiden.png|20px]] || 5 {{diamonds}} || 100% || 100% || Mine 100 Layer on the [[Underground]] || N/A |- | Kris [[File:HHKris.png|20px]] || 10 {{diamonds}} || 150% || 100% || 2,000 Diamonds {{diamonds}} || Purchase in [[Shops#Kanto: Locations & Items|Cinnabar Island]] |- | Noel [[File:HHNoel.png|20px]] || 25 {{battlepoints}} || 100% || 200% || 20,000 Battle Points {{battlepoints}} || Purchase in [[Battle Frontier]] |}
== Stats == Hatchery Helpers have 3 important stats: '''Cost, Step Efficiency and Attack Efficiency''' (see below). At this time, Hatchery Helpers don't Cost you anything when there are no eggs to hatch. Each individual Hatchery Helper gains Step Efficiency and Attack Efficiency the more Pokemon that they hatch, up to a limit of 50% bonus in each stat. As an example, Hatchery Helper Sam can thus have up to 60% Step Efficiency and 60% Attack Efficiency. Maxing out a Hatchery Helpers stats takes ~125,000 Pokemon Hatched by that helper.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Stat !! Description !! Usage |- | '''Cost''' || Cost Per Hatch of the Hatcher Helper || Cost is deducted from your every hatch that the Hatchery Helper made. |- | '''Step Efficiency''' || How much of the egg steps it will use || If the Hatchery helper has 50% step efficiency, they will use on the egg half of the egg steps you gain. |- | '''Attack Efficiency''' || How much of the attack you pokemon will gain || If the Hatchery helper has 50% attack efficiency, when the egg hatch it will gain half of the attack it should get. |- |}
== Usage ==
Clicking on "Sort" opens a dropdown that allows you to select which specific way the Hatchery Helpers works on, where the arrow is from the right it is following the highest to lowest of the option you selected if its the arrow is to the left it is going by lowest to highest.
[[Category:Eggs]]

{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Stat !! Description !! Usage |- | '''Cost''' || Cost Per Hatch of the Hatcher Helper || Cost is deducted from your every hatch that the Hatchery Helper made. |- | '''Step Efficiency''' || How much of the egg steps it will use || If the Hatchery helper has 50% step efficiency, they will use on the egg half of the egg steps you gain. |- | '''Attack Efficiency''' || How much of the attack you pokemon will gain || If the Hatchery helper has 50% attack efficiency, when the egg hatch it will gain half of the attack it should get. |- |}
== Usage ==
Clicking on "Sort" opens a dropdown that allows you to select which specific way the Hatchery Helpers works on, where the arrow is from the right it is following the highest to lowest of the option you selected if its the arrow is to the left it is going by lowest to highest.
